About Us

We are licensed and qualified to take on every residential housing project, large or small. We can help you with new design or just improve upon what you have.

We take on remodeling, rental property, and repair/new install of HVAC of any make and model.

  • Complete Home Remodel
  • Bathroom Remodel
  • Kitchen Remodel
  • Fence Replacement/Repair
  • Electrical
  • Landscaping
  • Haul away
  • Wall Removal
  • Countertops
  • Custom Cabinets

We come from a property management background and maintenance. We take the following type of works.

  • Wood Flooring install/removal
  • Tile Flooring install/removal
  • Drywall/Painting/Texture
  • Insulation
  • Framing
  • Plumbing
  • Property add-on
  • Updating Office Suite
  • Update/Remodel Apartment Complex
  • Renovate Apartment Show Rooms and Units
  • Renovate Gyms and Clubhouses
Schedule Appointment

Our Values

You can be sure of our values, our commitment to customers, and doing things right.

Experienced

We are a team of highly professional technician with a 42 years of experience in the field.

Trustworthy

Our technicians are experienced with a variety of skills in different fields and get work done.

Reliable

At Day or Night Handyman Services, we offer an exceptional service and high-quality workmanship.

Cost Effective

Our overheads are very low and hence you get a very competitive rate from us compared to much larger established companies.

Team

William Critchfield

(919) 500-8188

William Critchfield has 26 years of experience in property management and maintenance. Will has HVAC license since 1994. Bonded and insuranced.

Pricing

Our prices are very competitive. If it is a regular maintenance on HVAC, a visit to fix something, or a remodeling project, schedule a call for a consultation for a resonable price quote. Our prices are very competitive. If it is regular maintenance on HVAC, a visit to fix something, or a remodeling project, schedule a call for a consultation for a reasonable price quote.

Frequently Asked Questions

Get answers to frequently asked questions for handyman services.

  • Are you licensed for HVAC?

    Yes, both of partners Will and Phil are licensed for HVAC work in North Carolina.

  • What are the areas where you provide services?

    We provide services in greater triangle areas of Raleigh, Durham and Chapel Hill areas.

    Handyman in Sanford
    Handyman in Fuquay Varina
    Handyman in Dunn
    Handyman in Lillington
    Handyman in Springlake
    Handyman in Holly Springs
    Handyman in Apex
    Handyman in Cary
    Handyman in Morrisville
    Handyman in Clayton
    Handyman in Chatham County
    Handyman in Wake County
    Handyman in Harnett County
    Handyman in Lee County
    Handyman in Durham County
    Handyman in Johnson County

  • What are your typical charges for a visit?

    If you are calling us to provide a estimate and solution to your existing handyman needs, we will be glad to come and provide you a free estimate on any required services. Please call either Phil: (919) 796-5422 or Will: (919) 500-8188

  • Can you provide a professional estimate for a work?

    Yes, we will give you a free estimate for any services requested.

  • What is the warranty of the work?

    It is typically 3 months for a normal handyman work and varies for HVAC depending upon manufacturer warranty.
